attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GETTING GORDON BROWN TO LOOK AFTER UK RESIDENTS US JOE PUBLIC EG DISABLED-PENSIONERS-SINGLE PARENTS-SKILLED WORKERS-CHILDREN-UNHAPPY STAFF RE PATHETIC WAGES NURSES-SKILLED WORKERS-BEING BULLIED AT WORK.DHSS BENEFITS THAT NEED TO BE RAISED FOR GENUINE PEOPLE?
human rights act say we are being neglected by our own government.
never mind helping out 3rd world countries-the rich-giving your mps a payrise-£24,000 for 2nd homes LOOK AFTER JOE PUBLIC OR YOUR VOTERS WILL VOTE ELSEWHERE

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
